pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the Algorithm Selection Benchmark Library // Provides an interface to the algorithm selection benchmark library at http://www.aslib.net and the 'LLAMA' package (https://cran.r-project.org/package=llama) for building algorithm selection models; see Bischl et al. (2016) doi:10.1016/j.artint.2016.04.003.
